神秘地；故弄玄虚地；难以理解地
神秘化；困惑不解；骗人的把戏
使神秘化；使迷惑，使困惑

word_mean_info__list.difference: 语气较强，指复杂令人费解的情况或问题。
指常人难以认识其起因或性质的奥秘，或指有意不让人理解的奥妙。
指供人猜的谜语游戏，也可指终究会有解答的难题。
指有待探讨的疑难问题，也可指令人困惑的情况。

word_group.brief_definition: 神秘小说；推理小说；悬疑小说
真正的神奇之处；真实的谜团

bilingual.source: Mystery creates wonder and wonder is the basis of man's desire to understand.
bilingual.target: 神秘创造了奇迹，而奇迹是人类理解欲望的基础。

bilingual.source: Do you think adventure and mystery stories are more exciting than other kinds of stories?
bilingual.target: 你认为冒险和神秘故事比其他故事更刺激吗？

bilingual.source: Her smile has a hint of mystery.
bilingual.target: 她的笑容带有一丝神秘。
神秘气氛环绕着古代遗迹。

bilingual.source: The ancient ruins are shrouded in mystery.
bilingual.target: 古代遗迹笼罩在神秘的事物之中。

bilingual.source: The old castle was enveloped in mystery and legend.
bilingual.target: 古老的城堡被神秘和传说包围。

bilingual.source: The conte he shared was full of mystery and adventure.
bilingual.target: 他分享的故事充满了神秘和冒险。

bilingual.source: The mystery guest is no other than the famous actor.
bilingual.target: 这次的神秘嘉宾正是那位著名演员。

bilingual.source: The raven is often associated with mystery and magic.
bilingual.target: 渡鸦常常与神秘和魔法联系在一起。

bilingual.source: The mystery of the missing keys was finally solved.
bilingual.target: 丢失钥匙的神秘的事物终于被解开了。

list.abstract: mystery(英[ˈmɪstri]，美[ˈmɪstəri])，英语单词。词性是名词，释义为神秘的事物；难以理解的事物；谜。例句：Her uncontrollable coughing was a mystery.(她无法控制的咳嗽是一个谜)。 近义词有secret、privacy、confidence。
《Mystery》是韩国女子演唱团体少女时代成员金孝渊的首张单曲，已于2016年12月2日发行。

yingyinNormal.en: Would you like me to make you a mystery?
yingyinNormal.zh: 要我给你们制造一个神秘事件吗？

yingyinNormal.en: Mystery princess? My, what a charming notion.
yingyinNormal.zh: 神秘公主？天呐，多么迷人的想法。

yingyinNormal.en: Yeah, she's a mystery woman. A mystery makes a woman very intriguing.
yingyinNormal.zh: 是啊，她是个神秘的女人，神秘会激起人的兴趣。

yingyinNormal.en: Daddy, what is a mystery? A mystery is something detectives are good at sorting out, like finding things that are lost.
yingyinNormal.zh: 爸爸，什么是神秘事件啊？神秘事件就是那些侦探们最擅长处理的事件了，比如找到丢失的东西。

yingyinNormal.en: Daddy, what is a mystery? A mystery is something detectives are good at sorting out, like finding things that are lost.
yingyinNormal.zh: 爸爸，什么是神秘事件啊？神秘事件就是那些侦探们最擅长处理的事件了，比如找到丢失的东西。

yingyinNormal.en: Would you like me to make you a mystery? Yes, please.
yingyinNormal.zh: 要我给你们制造一个神秘事件吗？好的，太棒了。

yingyinNormal.en: It was not our fault, Mother. It was that girl. The mystery princess.
yingyinNormal.zh: 那不是我们的错，母亲，是那个女孩，那个神秘公主。

yingyinNormal.en: Ooh, this is exciting. Like one of my classic murder mystery dinner parties.
yingyinNormal.zh: 好兴奋刺激哦，跟我举办的神秘谋杀游戏晚餐派对一样。

yingyinNormal.en: The mystery is solved. Do you still want to be a detective when you grow up, Peppa?
yingyinNormal.zh: 神秘事件解决了。你们长大后还是想做侦探吗，佩奇？

yingyinNormal.en: The mystery is solved. Do you still want to be a detective when you grow up, Peppa?
yingyinNormal.zh: 神秘事件解决了。你们长大后还是想做侦探吗，佩奇？

yingyinNormal.en: Yeah, wouldn't you know it? My mystery man had left me with more than just a broken heart.
yingyinNormal.zh: 嗯，难倒没想到？我的神秘先生不止留给我一颗破碎的心。

yingyinNormal.en: Although why anybody would have anything other than peaches and cream to say about me is a mystery.
yingyinNormal.zh: 我以为除了阿谀奉承意外大家最多也就会说我比较神秘吧。

yingyinNormal.en: Wait, you're the mystery guy that Asher was spotted kissing? I know this isn't how you wanted this to happen.
yingyinNormal.zh: 你就是那个和阿瑟接吻的神秘人？我知道这不是你所希望的。

yingyinNormal.en: So, who's the mystery man? Well, he's a doctor. A real doctor? No, a doctor of meat.
yingyinNormal.zh: 那个神秘男子是谁？他是个医生（跟“博士”同词）。真正的医生？不，他是研究肉的。

yingyinNormal.en: You were my midnight mystery kisser?! You were my first kiss with Rachel?! You were my first kiss ever?!
yingyinNormal.zh: 你是我的午夜神秘接吻人？你是我和瑞秋的初吻？你就是我这辈子的初吻？！

yingyinNormal.en: It was quite easy for us. We're famous detectives. But that's only half the mystery. Where has Teddy gone?
yingyinNormal.zh: 这对我们来说太简单了，我们是世界著名的侦探。这只是神秘事件的一半。泰迪去哪了呢？

yingyinNormal.en: Can I have a go? The magnifying glass makes George's eyes look very big. Now what you detectives need is a mystery to solve.
yingyinNormal.zh: 我能试试吗？放大镜让乔治的眼睛显得特别大。现在轮到侦探出场了，有神秘事件要你们解决。

yingyinNormal.en: Can I have a go? The magnifying glass makes George's eyes look very big. Now what you detectives need is a mystery to solve.
yingyinNormal.zh: 我能试试吗？放大镜让乔治的眼睛显得特别大。现在轮到侦探出场了，有神秘事件要你们解决。

yingyinNormal.en: It was quite easy for us. We're famous detectives. But that's only half the mystery. Where has Teddy gone? Oh, I don't know.
yingyinNormal.zh: 这对我们来说太简单了，我们是世界著名的侦探。这只是神秘事件的一半。你们需要找到泰迪。噢，我不知道 。

yingyinNormal.en: It's been four days since Margot Kim was last seen. And so far, nothing to show for it except for the torturous mystery at its center.
yingyinNormal.zh: 离玛戈·金失踪已经四天之久了。到目前为止，除了令人痛苦的湖中神秘沉车没有再发现任何有价值的线索。

direction_info.description:
数据源自2012-2023年12年间全国考研试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight> 考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2012-2023年全国考研英语一和考研英语二共24套考研试卷，包括阅读、完型填空、翻译、写作等所有题型。

<highlight> 考纲释义</highlight>
精选全国考研考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2012-2023年12年间全国考研英语一和考研英语二试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

derivative_info_list.mean: adj. 神秘的；不可思议的；难以理解的；无法解释的；故弄玄虚的；诡秘的；气氛怪异的

word_family.mean: n. 神秘的事物；难以理解的事物；谜；疑案作品；秘密仪式；基于神的启示的宗教信仰；奥秘；技术；手艺；神秘

examination_example.sentence: How the whole image is then assembled and perceived is still a <highlight>mystery</highlight> although it is the subject of current research.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 尽管这是当前研究的主题，但如何整合和感知整个图像仍然是一个谜。

direction_info.description:
数据源自2016.6-2023.6年8年间全六级试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight>考纲释义</highlight>
精选实考、考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

direction_info.description:
数据源自2018-2021年4年间全国各省市中考试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight> 考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2018-2021年全国重点省市中考试卷，包括听力、阅读、完形、单选、填空、改错、写作等所有题型。

<highlight> 考纲释义</highlight>
精选各省市考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2018-2021年4年间全国各省市中考试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

derivative_info_list.mean: adj. 神秘的；不可思议的；难以理解的；无法解释的；故弄玄虚的；诡秘的；气氛怪异的

sense_info_list.zh: 神秘/不可思议的事物; 谜

examination_example.sentence: Here you can explore the universe and the unknown <highlight>mystery</highlight> behind it!
examination_example.sentence_trans: 在这里，你可以探索宇宙及其背后的未知奥秘！

examination_example.sentence: Many teenagers love <highlight>mysteries</highlight>, but usually they can’t find the ones that suit them the best.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 许多青少年喜欢神秘的事物，但通常他们找不到最适合自己的。

examination_example.sentence: Which of the <highlight>mysteries</highlight> would you suggest he should buy?
examination_example.sentence_trans: 你认为他应该买哪种神秘的东西？
